import os
import pandas as pd 
import numpy as np

import pydicom

import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objs as go
from plotly.offline import iplot

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

import cufflinks
cufflinks.go_offline()
cufflinks.set_config_file(world_readable=True, theme='pearl')

import seaborn as sns
sns.set(style="whitegrid")

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

def getHisto(col):
    fig = px.histogram(test_df, x=col)
    fig.update_layout(title_text=col + ' Distribution')
    fig.show()
source.3a1b4bcc: Males have Higher FVC irrespective of Age
source.d323d6f3: Somewhat of a linear distribution here between percent and FVC. Makes sense as both terms are proportional.
source.2f20cf7e: So the percentage doesnt show any specific trend with the weeks passed.
source.8cdaa918:
People with History of smoking clearly show higher FVC levels
